item.title: Technorati microformats search review
item.description: Technorati microformats search Category: Search engine Topic: microformats Year created: 2006 Overall rating: 4 out of 5 Content rating: 3 out of 5 Design rating: 4 out of 5 Navigation rating: 4 out of 5 I was supposed to attend a microformats dinner tonight in SF but was stymied by the impossibility of parking a car anywhere in that city. I returned to my hotel to catch up on the latest blogs to find a post from Tantek from Technorati announcing the launch of their microformats search.
